title: Transfer to South Korea
body:
Can I transfer my NA account to South Korea server? I have KSSN. I'm working here and I have a identification card. Please help me! I have put so much money on skins on my account. Its because of the ping that's why I decided now to transfer my account. I don't want to start again a new account. 

Sorry for my bad English.

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, unfortunately, we cannot transfer your account to the KR Region. Without creating a new account, I'm afraid there isn't another way to play on the KR server for you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Is it possible to transfer all skins and champions? Please....  Its because of the high ping now. Thats why  I just decided now to play in KR region. In 2015 the ping was okay, but this time december 2015 up to now, the ping is so high.

I'm sorry, but content is unable to be transferred between accounts. Loot and content are unique to an account and cannot be moved between accounts for any reason.

There may be some steps that can be taken in an attempt to improve your latency (ping), but your physical distance from the servers will cause a certain amount of latency to be unavoidable. If you'd like to try those steps, let me know what latency you're seeing in game right now and if you're seeing any issues.

Can Riot just transfer all my skins and champions? I have a KR account.

[(https://s28.postimg.org/tl97oszzh/16121965_1437491426284566_590474778_o.jpg)]
You can't transfer NA accounts to the South Korean server.  You can find all the eligible [regions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ)here.
